meanings.definition: Wifey - a slang term for a wife or girlfriend
meanings.sent1: My friend introduced me to his wifey at the party.
meanings.sent2: She's not just his wifey; she's also his best friend.
meanings.sent3: When they argue, he always says, 'Listen here, wifey!'
meanings.sent4: Their love story is like a fairytale - he found his wifey in a crowded city.
meanings.sent5: The ring on her finger proudly declares her as his wifey.

meanings.definition: Wifey - used to refer to a close female friend or companion
meanings.sent1: My group of wifeys and I always have fun together.
meanings.sent2: She's my go-to wifey whenever I need advice.
meanings.sent3: We jokingly call each other 'wifey' to show our bond.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, she's the wifey who always has my back.
meanings.sent5: Our friendship is so strong; we're like soulmate wifeys.
